trans-unit.source: You can view detailed analytics for your apps in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You can view detailed analytics for your apps in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Analytics
trans-unit.target: Analytics

trans-unit.source: Analytics
trans-unit.target: Analytics

trans-unit.source: You can view detailed analytics for your apps in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You can view detailed analytics for your apps in the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Statistics and charts let you know how your apps are doing—from how many customers you've reached to how they're using your app and what they have to say about it.
trans-unit.target: Statistics and charts let you know how your apps are doing—from how many customers you've reached to how they're using your app and what they have to say about it.

trans-unit.source: You can also find info on app health, ad usage, and more.
trans-unit.target: You can also find info on app health, ad usage, and more.

trans-unit.source: View the reports in the dashboard, or [download the reports you need](download-analytic-reports.md) to analyze your data offline.
trans-unit.target: View the reports in the dashboard, or [download the reports you need](download-analytic-reports.md) to analyze your data offline.

trans-unit.source: Analytics for all your apps
trans-unit.target: Analytics for all your apps

trans-unit.source: Your dashboard overview page also includes a roll-up view to gather details about all your apps.
trans-unit.target: Your dashboard overview page also includes a roll-up view to gather details about all your apps.

trans-unit.source: The stats shown on the overview page will vary, depending on your apps.
trans-unit.target: The stats shown on the overview page will vary, depending on your apps.

trans-unit.source: When you [download analytic reports](download-analytic-reports.md), you also have the option to download reports about all of your apps.
trans-unit.target: When you [download analytic reports](download-analytic-reports.md), you also have the option to download reports about all of your apps.

trans-unit.source: Note that you will need to access the **Download reports** page in the **Analytics** section for one of your apps, but you are not limited to downloading data only for that particular app.
trans-unit.target: Note that you will need to access the **Download reports** page in the **Analytics** section for one of your apps, but you are not limited to downloading data only for that particular app.

trans-unit.source: Available reports for each app
trans-unit.target: Available reports for each app

trans-unit.source: In this section you'll find details about the info presented in each of the following reports:
trans-unit.target: In this section you'll find details about the info presented in each of the following reports:

trans-unit.source: Acquisitions report
trans-unit.target: Acquisitions report

trans-unit.source: Health report
trans-unit.target: Health report

trans-unit.source: Ratings report
trans-unit.target: Ratings report

trans-unit.source: Reviews report
trans-unit.target: Reviews report

trans-unit.source: Usage report
trans-unit.target: Usage report

trans-unit.source: IAP acquisitions report
trans-unit.target: IAP acquisitions report

trans-unit.source: Ad mediation report
trans-unit.target: Ad mediation report

trans-unit.source: Advertising performance report
trans-unit.target: Advertising performance report

trans-unit.source: App install ads report
trans-unit.target: App install ads report

trans-unit.source: Channels and conversions report
trans-unit.target: Channels and conversions report

trans-unit.source: **Note** You may not see data in all of these reports, depending on your app's specific features and implementation.
trans-unit.target: **Note** You may not see data in all of these reports, depending on your app's specific features and implementation.

trans-unit.source: Page and section filters
trans-unit.target: Page and section filters

trans-unit.source: Each report includes filters that you can use to drill down into your data.
trans-unit.target: Each report includes filters that you can use to drill down into your data.

trans-unit.source: Near the top of the page you'll see **Apply filters**.
trans-unit.target: Near the top of the page you'll see **Apply filters**.

trans-unit.source: You can use these filters to limit or expand the scope of all of the charts and info on the page.
trans-unit.target: You can use these filters to limit or expand the scope of all of the charts and info on the page.

trans-unit.source: Within each particular chart, you may also see individual section filters.
trans-unit.target: Within each particular chart, you may also see individual section filters.

trans-unit.source: These will limit the data shown only for that particular chart.
trans-unit.target: These will limit the data shown only for that particular chart.

trans-unit.source: The specific filters vary by report.
trans-unit.target: The specific filters vary by report.

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section will explain which filters are available and will describe the other data on the page for each report.
trans-unit.target: The topics in this section will explain which filters are available and will describe the other data on the page for each report.
